Up_Down_Control.label: Up/Down Control
Up_Down_Control.description: This IPSO object is used to report the state of an up/down control element like a pair of push buttons or a rotary encoder. Counters for increase and decrease operations are provided for counting pulses from a quadrature encoder.

Up_Counter.label: Up Counter
Up_Counter.description: Counts the number of times the increase control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

Down_Counter.label: Down Counter
Down_Counter.description: Counts the times the decrease control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
